titles.title: Recognizing the importance of United States-India relations.
Recognizing the importance of United States-India relations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution reaffirms the strong and long-standing partnership between the governments of the United States and India. The resolution also encourages further defense, commercial, and investment ties between the countries, as well as continued cooperation for a free, open, and resilient Indo-Pacific.
